io.micronaut.serde

Interface Serializer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type to be serialized
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CustomizableSerializer<T>, NullableSerde<T>, NumberSerde<N>, Serde<T>, TemporalSerde<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBsonSerde, BsonRepresentationSerde, CodecBsonDecoder, CustomizedObjectArraySerializer, CustomizedObjectSerializer, DefaultFormattedTemporalSerde, HealthStatusSerde, InstantSerde, LocalDateSerde, LocalDateTimeSerde, LocalTimeSerde, ObjectArraySerde, ObjectSerializer, OffsetDateTimeSerde, SimpleObjectSerializer, YearSerde, ZonedDateTimeSerde

    @Indexed(value=Serializer.class)
public interface Serializer<T>
    Models a build time serializer. That is a class computed at build-time that can be used to serialize an instance of T.
    Author:
    Jonas Konrad, graemerocher

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Serializer.EncoderContext
      Context object passes to the serialize(Encoder, EncoderContext, Argument, Object) method.

      • serialize

        void serialize(@NonNull
               Encoder encoder,
               @NonNull
               Serializer.EncoderContext context,
               @NonNull
               io.micronaut.core.type.Argument<? extends T> type,
               @NonNull
               T value)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Serializes the given value using the passed Encoder.
        Parameters:
        encoder - The encoder to use
        context - The encoder context, never null
        type - Models the generic type of the value
        value - The value, can be null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs during serialization
